name: Sociology
description:
Department of Sociology contributes across faculties of the University. Department offers BA, MA, Ph.D programmes in Sociology under the Faculty of Arts. It offers Sociology courses as compulsory component of Humanities for students of all departments in the Faculty of Engineering and Technology. 
Department provides excellent academic infra-structure with five smart classes, a seminar hall with audio-visual equipment and large display screen, two computer laboratories and a departmental library with reading room.
A total of fifty students were awarded Ph D since 2004.
A total of forty students were recruited as full-time faculty in Colleges and Universities within and outside West Bengal.
Total research grant received in the last five years is Rs. 58,64,500. 
Publication rate per teacher per year is 1.5.
